column4: Hi, I've recently had an issue with some programs where when i mouse over them, gdm crashes. These specific applications consistently do this, as i mouse over them, when i run them. The list includes VLC Player 1.1.4, burg-manager 1.0, clementine 0.5.3, and MountManager 0.2.3
